snippet: Ferris State, which competes at the Division II level in all intercollegiate sports except hockey, will play Union College in Friday’s national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
abstract: Ferris State, which competes at the Division II level in all intercollegiate sports except hockey, will play Union College in the national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
lead_paragraph: Ferris State, which competes at the Division II level in all intercollegiate sports except hockey, will play Union College in Friday’s national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.

headline.seo: Frozen Four — Ferris State Hopes to Keep Making History on Ice
headline.main: Ferris State Hopes to Keep Making History on Ice
headline.print_headline: Ferris State Hopes to Keep Making History on Ice
